source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 563,263 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 271,573.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Taking Nature damage increases your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, and Versatility by 546 for 60 sec.
Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: While above 80% health, direct healing you do also redistributes up to 2% of your health to your target.
Use: Carve a wax copy of your target, which absorbs 50% of their damage taken. The absorption heats up the wax, causing it to melt after absorbing 3.6 million damage. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Removes any loss of control effect with a duration of 5 seconds or more. This effect can only occur once every 1 min.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 270,224 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,660 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
